section.title: MCP Chorus
section.para: A simple stereo chorus effect achieved by mixing in a copy of the source signal, delaying it a bit, then modulating the pitch of each channel a small amount to create a little colour.

entry.para: Maximum drift in milliseconds of first channel (left) as effected by modulator. The greater this value the greater the apparent detuning of the signal, which might not be wholly desirable.
As Freq 1 but for second (right) channel.
As Mod 1 but for second (right) channel.
